sentences.sContent: Lawmakers spent the day quibbling over the final wording of the resolution.
sentences.sCn: 立法者们花了一天争辩决议的最后措词。

synos.tran: 诡辩；挑剔；说模棱两可的话

hwds.w: prove that black is white and white black

words.tran: 推托；说模棱两可的话（quibble的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 诡辩；挑剔；说模棱两可的话
trans.tranOther: When people quibble over a small matter, they argue about it even though it is not important
